tasks.build: npm run build -- && ./scripts/updateVersion.sh && deno check -c deno.json && deno run -A https://github.com/silverbulletmd/silverbullet/releases/download/edge/plug-compile.js --info -c deno.json silversearch.plug.yaml
tasks.debug: npm run build -- && ./scripts/updateVersion.sh && deno check -c deno.json && deno run -A https://github.com/silverbulletmd/silverbullet/releases/download/edge/plug-compile.js --debug -c deno.json silversearch.plug.yaml
